survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Corporate Learning and Development Programs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their satisfaction with the corporate learning and development programs offered by the company. The insights will help improve future training initiatives.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the corporate learning and development programs offered by your company?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better granularity in responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the corporate learning and development programs offered by your company?

questions.question_text: Which of the following learning and development programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse participation.

script.question_text: Which of the following learning and development programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the corporate learning and development programs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the corporate learning and development programs?

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in learning and development programs?
questions.client_notes: Capture frequency of participation to assess engagement levels.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in learning and development programs?

questions.question_text: Do you feel that the learning and development programs have contributed to your career growth?
questions.client_notes: Assess perceived impact of programs on career growth.

script.question_text: Do you feel that the learning and development programs have contributed to your career growth?
